text: vah allaah hee hai, jisake atirikt nahin hai[1] koee sachcha vandaneey. vah sabaka svaamee, atyant pavitr, sarvatha shaanti pradaan karane vaala, rakshak, prabhaavashaalee, shaktishaalee bal poorvak aadesh laagoo karane vaala, badaee vaala hai. pavitr hai allaah usase, jise ve (usaka) saajhee banaate hain
